mapper.select: SELECT USER.user_name, USER.user_id, COMMENT.comment_no, COMMENT.comment_content, COMMENT.comment_date, USER.user_name FROM COMMENT JOIN USER ON COMMENT.user_no = USER.user_no WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY comment_no
SELECT comment_no FROM COMMENT ORDER BY comment_no desc limit 1
SELECT board_no, count(comment_no) as comment_count FROM COMMENT group by board_no;
